definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
Gang of Four: Jiang Qing 江青, Zhang Chunqiao 張春橋, Yao Wenyuan 姚文元, Wang Hongwen 王洪文, who served as scapegoats for the excesses of the cultural revolution
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]

sentences.english: The first thing he asked me was to help him get some dynamite, so that he could blow up Kim Jong Il.
sentences.chinese: 他对我提的第一个要求就是帮他搞到一些炸药。

sentences.english: Yes, I would like to help you carry these bags.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我愿意帮你拿一下这些包。

sentences.english: Can I get you your drink while you are making your selection?
sentences.chinese: 在您点餐的时候，我可以帮你拿杯饮料吗？

sentences.english: I have some problems at home these days could you please ask Mr. Wang for permission to leave?
sentences.chinese: 我这几天家里有事，你能帮我向王老师请假吗？

sentences.english: May I help you with your bags, sir.
sentences.chinese: 先生，我帮您提行李好吗？

sentences.english: A Roget's Thesaurus will do the trick, as will any number of vocabulary building books.
sentences.chinese: 一本罗热辞典或者其它词汇书就可以帮你做到这一点。

sentences.english: After all, it was nearly the same in both languages, and only two hours beforehand he had been helping to lug my bike about.
sentences.chinese: 而且仅仅在两小时之前他还帮我存放自行车呢。

sentences.english: Let me help you carry this suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 让我来帮您提这个箱子。

sentences.english: Will you wind this wool for me?
sentences.chinese: 请你帮我将这些毛线缠起来好吗？

sentences.english: Could you help me select a slow song?
Do yuo want to help your family save cash when times are tight ?
sentences.chinese: 既然经济不景气，想帮家里节省开支吗？

sentences.english: Don't cry, you know, no one will help you to wipe tears.
sentences.chinese: 不要流泪了，你要知道，没有人会帮你擦眼泪。

sentences.english: He will shine through your idle thoughts today, and help you understand the truth of love.
sentences.chinese: 他今天会照透你的无谓的杂念，帮你了解爱的真相。

sentences.english: As I watched her unload my luggage, I could see the sadness in her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她帮我卸着行李，而眼神里却满是伤心和不舍。

sentences.english: During my stay in bed, some of them came to see me and helped me with my lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我住院期间，一些同学来探望我，并帮我补习功课。

sentences.english: If you plan on not attending class, make sure you have a buddy that will sign u in.
sentences.chinese: 要是你打算跷课，先保证有个家伙能帮你签到。

definition: to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
to do sth in place of sb else
to share (a burden, a cost, a responsibility)
